Documentation.content: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes.

Definition.name: FromR8Set

param.name: mat_data
param.desc: A set of REAL8 values representing a matrix in column major order [r1c1, r2c1, r3c1, ..., rNc1, r1c2, ..., rNcM]

param.name: num_rows
param.desc: The number of rows in the matrix

param.name: row_offset
param.desc: The offset to the starting row of this sub-matrix (optional)

param.name: col_offset
param.desc: The offset to starting column of this sub-matrix (optional)

Documentation.content: Take a dense matrix or submatrix and convert it to a sparse matrix in Layout_Cell format.

Signature.sign: DATASET(Layout_Cell) FromR8Set(SET OF REAL8 mat_data, dimension_t num_rows, dimension_t row_offset=0, dimension_t col_offset=0)
Signature.name: FromR8Set

Definition.Signature: DATASET(Layout_Cell) FromR8Set(SET OF REAL8 mat_data, dimension_t num_rows, dimension_t row_offset=0, dimension_t col_offset=0)

param.name: num_rows
